query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `campaign_workflows` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `campaign_id` INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `workflow_name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `is_active` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `campaign_workflows` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `campaign_id` INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `workflow_name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `is_active` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
